metadata.title: CVE-2023-4047 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A bug in popup notifications delay calculation could have made it possiblefor an attacker to trick a user into granting permissions. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 116, Firefox ESR < 102.14, and Firefox ESR< 115.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
